attributes.action: Ensure the future of the Bands of H.M.Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would ask the Prime Minister to examine the state of Military Bands in this Country. The Bands of The Army, The RAF and The Royal Marines are world renowned for there musical excellence and perfect drill. With all the cuts taking part in the military, we are not only loosing the great traditions that make our military the immense force that it is but some of its world famous bands. In the 1970's there was nearly 200 pupils at the Royal Military School of Muisc, Kneller Hall, now there is barely 25. We ask you not to let the Great British tradition of military bands die.
